data.text:
The Senior Support Technician will work as part of an advanced Support team to resolve issues spanning multiple technologies and serve as the escalation point for the Support and Operations teams. This role is customer-facing and involves availability 24/7 for afterhours pager rotation during evenings and weekends. This position requires a valid driver’s license and vehicle.

This position will also take part in the following:

• Participate in Change management process ensuring all changes to the customers environment are logged, approved and scheduled

• Conduct and participate in Root Cause Analysis of issues causing major impact to production

• Support environments including: NetApp SANs, Citrix XenServer, NetScalers, Microsoft Windows Server, Exchange, Lync, VMware, CommVault, Cisco network devices

This position requires the following education and qualifications:

• College or University education in Electronics or Computer Science

• MCPITP Workstation and Server Certification

• ITIL V3 Foundations a must

• CCNA Certification

• Intermediate+ experience with: NetApp SANs, Citrix XenServer, NetScalers, Microsoft Windows Server, Exchange, Lync, VMware, CommVault, Cisco network devices an asset.

• Solid business presentation skills – including adhering to the CTS business Attire Dress Code

Compugen is an organization that encourages and supports ongoing training and development opportunities. We are composed of a talented, diversified workforce that performs collectively in an entrepreneurial and flexible environment. Our staff members have access to the latest and greatest technologies in performing their daily activities.
